verses.text_plain: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.
verses.verse_html:
1Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer. ▼
▼ chief…: or, overseer
 , ▼
▼ have…: or, be gracious unto me

footnotes.body_text: ▼ have…: or, be gracious unto me
footnotes.body_html: ▼ have…: or, be gracious unto me

verses.text_plain: O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.
verses.verse_html: 2O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.

verses.text_plain: But know that the Lord hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the Lord will hear when I call unto him.
verses.verse_html: 3But know that the Lord hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the Lord will hear when I call unto him.

verses.text_plain: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 4Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.

verses.text_plain: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 5Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the Lord.

verses.text_plain: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
verses.verse_html: 6There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.
verses.verse_html: 7Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.

verses.text_plain: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.
verses.verse_html: 8I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.
